text: Franci Čop (17 November 1914 - 6 November 2003) was a Slovenian alpine skier. He competed at the 1936 Winter Olympics and the 1948 Winter Olympics, representing Yugoslavia. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Slovenian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Yugoslavia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Jesenice, Jesenice
title: Franci Čop
